text: Mana awundi olalekha akandi kalia akawafimbulilwa, ne eshilifu shishio shitsa okhulola obusiro khulwa ako shichila okhuboola khwabu mbu; â€œshichila shina nakhaya okhwishilibwa eshiachi nohomba Malaika okhwitsa halala ninaye? Ewe oli omwikanyilisi butswa, ne Nyasaye niye omulindi wabuli eshindu
